definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="execute_command"><value name="command"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">/summon enemyexpansion:invisicreeper ~ ~ ~ {Silent:1b,NoAI:1b,Health:1f,Fuse:1,ignited:1b,ExplosionRadius:2b,CustomName:'{"text":"Crawler"}'}</field></block></value><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"></block></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"></block></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"></block></value><next><block type="wait"><value name="ticks"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><statement name="do"><block type="entity_despawn"><value name="entity"><block type="immediate_source_entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></statement></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
